column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I came in midday and it was moderately busy. Service was good but not mindblowing. I got two pastries and some kind of mocha coffee. Sadly both the pastried were just ok and a bit dry. My coffee was pretty good
column2: it wasn't overly sweet and the coffee has a pretty interesting and intense aroma. One thing I will say is that this cafe has great ambiance
column3: the windows are huge and let alot of light which is great
column4: even though this place gets crowded the space is arranged nicely so you never feel like you are in anybody's way.
